Levels.Description: I wish I had a future that clear

The soft, woolly blanket of indifference.
Dull (\ˈdəl\) : lacking sharpness of edge or point; also tedious, uninteresting. Ex: the sky, you. See also: lacking brilliance, lust, zest or action.
